languages.text: "Воистину! Отпустить свой разум в свободное странствие и смело черпать из накопленного Знания — удовольствие превыше всех прочих!"
"Indeed! To let your mind wander free and to bravely plumb the depths of accumulated Knowledge is a pleasure above all others!"
languages.original_text: "Воистину! Отпустить свой разум в свободное странствие и смело черпать из накопленного Знания — удовольствие превыше всех прочих!"

traits.locale_text: "Indeed! To let your mind wander free and to bravely plumb the depths of accumulated Knowledge is a pleasure above the rest!"
"Indeed! To let your mind wander free and to bravely plumb the depths of accumulated Knowledge is a pleasure above the rest!"
"Indeed! To let your mind wander free and to bravely plumb the depths of accumulated Knowledge is a pleasure above all others!"
"Indeed! To let your mind wander free and to bravely plumb the depths of accumulated Knowledge is a pleasure above all others!"
"Indeed! To let your mind wander free and to bravely plumb the depths of accumulated Knowledge is a pleasure above all others!"

languages.text: “确实如此！让你的思想自由徜徉，勇敢地探索知识海洋中不为人知的领域吧！这种快乐高于一切！”
languages.original_text: "Indeed! To let your mind wander free and to bravely plumb the depths of accumulated Knowledge is a pleasure above all others!"

traits.locale_text: “确实如此！让你的思想自由徜徉，勇敢地探索知识海洋中不为人知的领域吧！这种快乐高于一切！”

languages.text: «¡Así es! ¡Dejar que la mente vague y adentrarse en las profundidades del conocimiento acumulado es un placer incomparable!».
languages.original_text: "Indeed! To let your mind wander free and to bravely plumb the depths of accumulated Knowledge is a pleasure above all others!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Así es! ¡Dejar que la mente vague y adentrarse en las profundidades del conocimiento acumulado es un placer incomparable!».

languages.text: 「同感だ！思考を自由に巡らせて、蓄えた知識をどんどん深掘りしていくのは何よりも心地よい！」
languages.original_text: "Indeed! To let your mind wander free and to bravely plumb the depths of accumulated Knowledge is a pleasure above all others!"

traits.locale_text: 「同感だ！思考を自由に巡らせて、蓄えた知識をどんどん深掘りしていくのは何よりも心地よい！」

languages.text: "In der Tat! Mit frei herumwanderndem Geist mutig die Tiefen des angesammelten Wissens zu erkunden, ist ein unvergleichliches Vergnügen!"
languages.original_text: "Indeed! To let your mind wander free and to bravely plumb the depths of accumulated Knowledge is a pleasure above all others!"

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat! Mit frei herumwanderndem Geist mutig die Tiefen des angesammelten Wissens zu erkunden, ist ein unvergleichliches Vergnügen!"

languages.text: « Tout à fait ! Il n'y a rien de plus plaisant que de laisser libre cours à son esprit et de sonder sans retenue les profondeurs de la connaissance accumulée ! »
languages.original_text: "Indeed! To let your mind wander free and to bravely plumb the depths of accumulated Knowledge is a pleasure above all others!"

traits.locale_text: « Tout à fait ! Il n'y a rien de plus plaisant que de laisser libre cours à son esprit et de sonder sans retenue les profondeurs de la connaissance accumulée ! »

languages.text: "Kesinlikle! Zihnini özgür bırakıp İrfan birikiminin derinliklerine dalabilmek, evrendeki en büyük zevk!"
languages.original_text: "Indeed! To let your mind wander free and to bravely plumb the depths of accumulated Knowledge is a pleasure above all others!"

traits.locale_text: "Kesinlikle! Zihnini özgür bırakıp İrfan birikiminin derinliklerine dalabilmek, evrendeki en büyük zevk!"
